statements.name: PROC SMSCORE
statements.help:
PROC SMSCORE  NAME=libref.data-table REP=libref.data-table<options>;                 
	OUTPUT  OUT=libref.data-table;                 
	PROJECT  ID=(project-ID-list) <option>;

arguments.name: NAME=
arguments.description: specifies the SAS data table (project repository) that contains the projects to be scored

arguments.name: REP=
arguments.description: specifies a binary scoring repository that contains information that is required for scoring for each calibrated model

arguments.name: MODELS=
arguments.description: specifies a SAS data table that contains a list of project IDs and model IDs for which scoring is requested

arguments.name: MAXOBS=
arguments.description: specifies the maximum number of observations to retrieve for plotting

arguments.name: NTHREADS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of threads to use in the computation

arguments.name: OUT=
arguments.description: specifies the SAS data table to contain the scoring output

statements.name: PROJECT
statements.description: specifies which project IDs from the current project repository are to be scored

arguments.name: MODELID=
arguments.description: specifies a comma-separated list of model IDs within parentheses
